item.description:
Celebrate Earth Day in style on Saturday, April 21st from 7-10 pm, at ArtSpace in downtown Hartford, with an environmentally conscience community event featuring a recycling inspired fashion show set to live music. This is a collaborated event with Evergreen Design Co. will bring like-minded people together to celebrate Earth Day and with a common theme of Make Art Not Trash. All proceeds go to support Evergreen Design Co. & The Sustainable Farm School in Simsbury, CT.Attendees are recommended to arrive early to check out the eco-friendly vendors, who will have goods available for sale as well as local earth friendly groups. Learn how to compost, recycle, upcycle, repurpose old items and how to plant seeds.Doors open at 6:30 pm; tickets are $15 in advance or at the door. Tickets are available though brown paper bag tickets. ArtSpace is located at 555 Asylum Street, Hartford.

https://www.brownpapertickets.com/event/236366
item.name: 2nd Annual Trashion Fashion Show held at Art Space Saturday April 2st.
